abstract: Subscribers to Hulu's pay service can get CW shows at midnight after they are on the CW, and nonsubscribing Hulu users can watch up to five episodes beginning eight days after they are broadcast.
snippet: Subscribers to Hulu's pay service can get CW shows at midnight after they are on the CW, and nonsubscribing Hulu users can watch up to five episodes beginning eight days after they are broadcast.

headline.main: CW Network in Deal to Put Shows on Hulu
